name: Vigo's Adventure: Paroxysm
description:
Welcome to Insane World. Your sanity is gone. Vigo has trapped in his nightmare, and you're the only one who can help him to escape.

Official Soundtrack: https://soundcloud.com/dishdriver/sets/vigos-adventure-paroxysm-ost

SYSTEM REQUIREMENTS:
OS: Win XP, 7, Vista, 8, 10 and more
Processor: 2 GHz
Memory: 2 GB RAM
Graphics: 512 MB
Hard Drive: 500 MB available space
